pullRequest.title: Remove Mostly Redundant Deleting in FsBlobContainer
pullRequest.bodyText:
In almost all cases we write uuid named files via this method.
Preemptively deleting just wastes IO ops, we can delete after a write failed
and retry the write to cover the few cases where we actually do an overwrite.

commit.message:
Remove Redundant Deleting in FsBlobContainer

In almost all cases we write uuid named files via this method.
Preemptively deleting just wastes IO ops, we can delete after a write failed
and retry the write to cover the few cases where we actually do an overwrite.

nodes.bodyText: Not sure why you put this in an else block, but the next call to writeToPath outside of it. I would either put both in else (preferred) or none of them
